column4: I just installed ubunto 5.04, and want to upgrade to 5.10, is there a way of only installing the package ubuntu-minimal?
I've upgraded to breeze, but now eth0 is not configured by dhcp, how can I fix this?
/etc/network/interfaces has eth0 with dhcp, but it does not work :(
Look for a network interface program. There's one with gnome that allows you to turn dhcp on and off
